text: Nemir A. Kirdar ( - 9 June 2020) was an Iraqi-British-French businessman and financier. He founded Investcorp, and was CEO for over 30 years until he stood down in 2015 to became chairman until his retirement in 2017. He was born in Kirkuk Governorate, Iraq. Kirdar died at his home in Cap Dâ€™Antibes, France from dementia-related problems on 9 June 2020, aged 83.Nemir Kirdar, father of private equity globally, dies at 83 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Kirkuk Governorate Category:Businesspeople from London
title: Nemir Kirdar
